course.title: PSY 2116 Quantitative Methods in Psychology II (3 units)
course.desc: Statistical inference: simple and complex analysis of variance, multiple comparisons, trend analysis, power and covariance analysis. Application to psychology.Course Component: Laboratory, LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102, PSY 2106. Reserved for students registered in the Major, Joint Honours and Honours programs in psychology.
